sen.j: 姉小路通（あねやこうじどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Aneyakoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
The Aneyakoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
The Aneyakoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 平安京の姉小路に相当する。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Anekoji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Anekoji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Anekoji of Heiankyo.

sen.j: 東は木屋町通から西は佐井通（春日通）まで。
sen.e: It extends from Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Sai-dori Street (Kasuga-dori Street) in the west.
It extends from Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Sai-dori Street (Kasuga-dori Street) in the west.
It extends from Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Sai-dori Street (Kasuga-dori Street) in the west.

sen.j: 他の多くの通りと同様に寺町通で鍵の手に折れる。
sen.e: Like many other streets, it intersects with Teramachi-dori Street, forming right angled corners.
Like many other streets, it intersects with Teramachi-dori Street, forming right angled corners.
Like many other streets, it intersects with Teramachi-dori Street, forming right angled corners.

sen.j: 「あねこうじ」と読むこともある。
sen.e: The street is sometimes called "Anekoji" as well.
The street is sometimes called "Anekoji" as well.
The street is sometimes called 'Anekoji' as well.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更

sen.j: 江戸時代には「あねがこうじ」「あねのこうじ」などと呼ばれた。
sen.e: During the Edo era it was also called "Anekoji," and "Anenokoji."
During the Edo era it was also called "Anekoji," and "Anenokoji."
During the Edo era it was also called 'Anekoji,' and 'Anenokoji.'
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
